version_description: Fixes for a few small bugs.

This update to our app includes:
-Ability to set the time out period that the app will stay logged in for when it’s running in the background
-Fixes to a number of bugs that were causing some issues when using TouchID and viewing your transactions
As well as a number of bug fixes this version also allows customers to easily share their account details over WhatsApp, Messages and email.

With the latest version of Metro Bank's app customer can:
- Open Instant Access Savings Accounts
- Set up and edit Standing Orders from 'Manage Payments'

We have also fixed a number of small bugs.

With the latest version of Metro Bank's app customer can:
- Open Instant Access Savings Accounts
- Set up and edit Standing Orders from 'Manage Payments'

We have also fixed a number of small bugs.

You can now create new payees within your Metro Bank app! Simply tap on the '+' button on the top right of the payee selection screen and follow a few simple steps!

What else is included within this release:
- Back by popular demand, you can now 'shake and logout'. This was a much loved feature of Metro Bank's old app so we've brought it back!
- We've made some of your transaction details clearer to understand
- Fixes to a number of bugs and stability issues.

Lost, stolen or damaged card? You can now report it to us and order a new one straight to your address! To do this go to ‘Manage my cards’ under the ‘More’ tab.

What else is included within this release:
•You can now view your personal details.
•Have an iPhone X? Good news the app is now optimised for you!
•Bug fixes.

Lost, stolen or damaged card? You can now report it to us and order a new one straight to your address! To do this go to ‘Manage my cards’ under the ‘More’ tab.
What else is included within this release:
•You can now view your personal details.
•Have an iPhone X? Good news the app is now optimised for you!
•Bug fixes.

Lost, stolen or damaged card? You can now report it to us and order a new one straight to your address! To do this go to ‘Manage my cards’ under the ‘More’ tab.
What else is included within this release:
•You can now view your personal details.
•Have an iPhone X? Good news the app is now optimised for you!
•Bug fixes.

We have introduced "Insights" our new AI-powered money management service helping customers make better decisions when it comes to managing their money.

Receive the following Insights and much more:
- Your total ingoings and outgoings each month
- Breakdown of spending across different categories
- Alerts on refunds and duplicate transactions
- Updates on increases or decreases of regular payments

You can opt-in and out of Insights at any point.

Make International Payments with our mobile app
- Send Euros, US Dollars and UK Sterling to more than 35 countries
- Create international payees or select from your existing ones
- Start making International Payments from the Pay, Transfer and Account tabs
This update includes improvements and fixes to the app.
This update includes improvements and fixes to the app

We’ve introduced new features and improvements in our latest update
- New Pay and Transfer menu
- Auto-Pull in One Time Passcode
- Search Beneficiaries
- New Travel Abroad Section
- Share Payment Confirmation
- General Bugs and Fixes

. New home screen with quick links to Manage Cards and Payments
· New Products & Services tab
· New Settings area to set all your preference
· Switcher for Business and Personal customers, as well as for those customers with more than one business

. New home screen with quick links to Manage Cards and Payments
· New Products & Services tab
· New Settings area to set all your preference
· Switcher for Business and Personal customers, as well as for those customers with more than one business
. Minor Bug fixes
Bugs and Fixes

- We’ve changed how we show available and overdraft balances
- Improvements, Bugs and Fixes
Bugs, fixes and improvements

- We’re excited to introduce the ability to capture and store receipts within the app for our Business Customers.
- We’ve also made fixed some bugs and issues for all customers.
We've fixed bugs and issues for customers

Business customers can now set up a Clear Books accountancy software subscription and get 25% off.
They can also easily sync their transaction data via our new direct bank feed.

We’ve made our mobile banking app more secure in line with regulation from the Financial Conduct Authority.

What’s changing?
- You need to change your passcode from four digits to six digits
- You may receive a one-time passcode when logging in, adding new payees or making payments
Bugs and fixes

- We have introduced additional messaging in the New Payee journey asking customers to choose the reason for their payment and providing advice to support them in avoiding common payment scams. This change applies to Personal and Business customers creating new payees for standing orders, domestic and international payments

- Bug fixes and enhancements

We have now included the IBAN and SWIFT BIC codes in the account details you can share from the app. In addition we have added a new 'Account Details' screen allowing you to view all these details prior to sharing
Bug fixes and enhancements
